headline: Sands Capital Select Growth Fund Closed Lam Research Corporation (LRCX) on Valuation Concerns
summary: Sands Capital, an investment management company, released its “Sands Capital Select Growth Fund” Q4 2024 investor letter. A copy of the same can be downloaded here. Select Growth primarily targets U.S. companies that are leading the way in crucial areas of positive structural transformation within the economy. The fund returned 8.8% (net) in the fourth […]
